amendment.description: To increase appropriations for salaries and expenses for hiring 200 additional Assistant United States Attorneys for the prosecution of offenses relating to the sexual exploitation of children, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3290 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3290 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Smith. (consideration: CR S12913-12914) To increase appropriations for salaries and expenses for hiring 200 additional Assistant United States Attorneys for the prosecution of offenses relating to the sexual exploitation of children, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3290 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3290 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Smith.
